projectDescription: building a pool in my backgarden, leveling land and laying ground work

milestones.title: Project Initiation and Land Survey
milestones.description: Initial client meeting to discuss project specifics, Land survey to determine the best location for the pool, Detailed project plan creation

milestones.title: Land Leveling
milestones.description: Clearing the chosen area of any debris or plants, Leveling the land to ensure a flat surface for pool construction, Disposal of excess soil or debris

milestones.title: Laying Groundwork
milestones.description: Digging the pool hole, Installing the pool framework, Laying the groundwork including plumbing and electrical installation

milestones.title: Pool Construction
milestones.description: Constructing the pool shell, Installing the pool liner, Filling the pool with water and testing the system

milestones.title: Final Inspection and Handover
milestones.description: Conducting a final inspection to ensure the pool meets all safety standards, Client walkthrough and handover, Finalizing project documentation
